item.title: Re-learning Vim (1)
item.description: I can use Vim as a basic editor with TKL-keyboard while tapping some keys multiple times. Functional but not elegant! I decided to re-learn Vim to use it properly. Here is my learning memo. Concept Use default vim (minimum configuration, if possible). Use as much native functionalities. 50%/60%-keyboard ready. No cursor keys. Guiding voice Here are a few insightful recommendations for the best practices for Vim.
